blocks.name: df-cusp

blocks.name: iscusp
blocks.content: The predicate " ` W ` is a complete uniform space." (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Dec-2017.)

thm iscusp(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccusp), wa(wcel(c0, cusp), wral(s0, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, c0)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccusp, cusp, wral(s0, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, c0)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))), wral(s0, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  2fveq3(cv(hs0), c0, cfil, cbs)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, cv(hs0))), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  2fveq3(cv(hs0), c0, ccfilu, cuss)
  neeq1d(co(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls, co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cflim, cv(s0), cfv(ctopn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctopn)
  df-cusp(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cusp)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, c0)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(s0)), emptycls))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CUnifSp ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà UnifSp ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Fil `(Base ` c0)),(s0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚Üí((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ))))

} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccusp, cusp, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Fil `(Base ` c0)),(s0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚Üí((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Fil `(Base ` hs0)),(s0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` hs0))‚Üí((TopOpen ` hs0)[fLim]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  raleqbidv(s0, (Fil `(Base ` hs0)), (Fil `(Base ` c0)), hs0 = c0, (s0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` hs0))‚Üí((TopOpen ` hs0)[fLim]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ), (s0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚Üí((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  2fveq3(hs0, c0, cfil, cbs)
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, s0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` hs0)), ((TopOpen ` hs0)[fLim]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ, s0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0)), ((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  eleq2d(s0, (CauFilU `(UnifSt ` hs0)), (CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0)), hs0 = c0)
  2fveq3(hs0, c0, ccfilu, cuss)
  neeq1d(((TopOpen ` hs0)[fLim]s0), emptycls, ((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1d((TopOpen ` hs0), cflim, s0, (TopOpen ` c0), hs0 = c0)

  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(Fil `(Base ` c0)),(s0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚Üí((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]s0)‚â† ‚àÖ)))

blocks.name: cuspusp
blocks.content: A complete uniform space is an uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: cuspcvg
blocks.content: In a complete uniform space, any Cauchy filter ` C ` has a limit. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cuspcvg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccusp), wcel(c1, cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))), wne(co(c3, cflim, c1), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  3com23(wcel(c0, ccusp), wcel(c1, cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wne(co(c3, cflim, c1), emptycls))
  3impia(wcel(c0, ccusp), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(c3, cflim, c1), emptycls))
  rspcdva(hs0, c1, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))), wi(wcel(c1, cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(c3, cflim, c1), emptycls)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(c3, cflim, c1), emptycls))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0)))
  neeq1d(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls, co(c3, cflim, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq12d(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(hs0), c3, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), c3))
  eqcomi(cfv(ctopn, c0), c3)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccusp), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ccusp), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), cflim, cv(hs0)), emptycls))), wcel(c0, cusp))
  iscusp(hs0, c0)
  syl6eleq(c1, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cfil, c2), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, ccusp), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c2)))
  fveq2i(cfil, c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c1, cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c0))), wne(co(c3, cflim, c1), emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm cuspcvg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CUnifSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚àß c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2))‚Üí(c3[fLim]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(TopOpen ` c0)
} = {
  3com23(c0 ‚àà CUnifSp, c1 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0)), c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2), (c3[fLim]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  3impia(c0 ‚àà CUnifSp, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2), c1 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0)), (c3[fLim]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  rspcdva(hs0, c1, (Fil `(Base ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà CUnifSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2)), (c1 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚Üí(c3[fLim]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ), (hs0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚Üí((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0)), ((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0)), (c3[fLim]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, (CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0)))
  neeq1d(((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]hs0), emptycls, (c3[fLim]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq12d((TopOpen ` c0), cflim, hs0, c3, c1, hs0 = c1)
  a1i(hs0 = c1, (TopOpen ` c0)= c3)
  eqcomi((TopOpen ` c0), c3)
  id(hs0 = c1)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CUnifSp, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Fil `(Base ` c0)),(hs0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚Üí((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ)))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà CUnifSp, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Fil `(Base ` c0)),(hs0 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚Üí((TopOpen ` c0)[fLim]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ)), c0 ‚àà UnifSp)
  iscusp(hs0, c0)
  syl6eleq(c1, (Fil `(Base ` c0)), (Fil ` c2), (c0 ‚àà CUnifSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2)))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà CUnifSp, c1 ‚àà(Fil ` c2))
  fveq2i(cfil, c2, (Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Fil `(Base ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ‚àà(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` c0))‚Üí(c3[fLim]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: cnextucn
blocks.content: Extension by continuity. Proposition 11 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.20. Given a topology ` J ` on ` X ` , a subset ` A ` dense in ` X ` , this states a condition for ` F ` from ` A ` to a space ` Y ` Hausdorff and complete to be extensible by continuity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnextucn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(co(c0, ccnext, c1), c2), co(c0, ccn, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cuss, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ctps))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ctps))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ccusp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cha))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c8, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c8, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c8), c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cfv(co(c5, cfm, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8)), cfv(ccfilu, c7)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  cnextcn(s0, c0, c1, c2, cuni(c0), cuni(c1), c8, w0)
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  mpbid(w0, wf(c2, c8, cuni(c1)), wf(c2, c8, c5))
  feq3d(c2, c8, c5, cuni(c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c5, cuni(c1)), wcel(c6, ctps))
  tpsuni(c6, c5, c1)
  sseqtrd(c8, cuni(c0), c3, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c8), cuni(c0), c3, w0)
  eqnetrd(cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8)), c2), emptycls, co(c1, cflim, cfv(co(c5, cfm, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8)), c2), co(c1, cflim, cfv(co(c5, cfm, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8)))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c5)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8), cfv(cfil, c8)), wf(c2, c8, c5))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c5)), wcel(c6, ctps))
  istps(c6, c1, c5)
  flfval(c1, c5, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8), c8, c2)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0))), wne(co(c1, cflim, cfv(co(c5, cfm, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8))), emptycls), wcel(c6, ccusp), wcel(cfv(co(c5, cfm, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8)), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c6))), wcel(cfv(co(c5, cfm, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8)), cfv(cfil, c5)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wcel(c6, ccusp))
  syl6eleq(cfv(co(c5, cfm, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c8)), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, c6)), cfv(ccfilu, c7), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0))))

blocks.name: ucnextcn
blocks.content: Extension by continuity. Theorem 2 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.20. Given an uniform space on a set ` X ` , a subset ` A ` dense in ` X ` , and a function ` F ` uniformly continuous from ` A ` to ` Y ` , that function can be extended by continuity to the whole ` X ` , and its extension is uniformly continuous. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2018.)
